title: NZ deeply concerned about hardships in Sri Lanka: NZ Foreign Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); New Zealand will provide 500,000 New Zealand dollar donation to Sri Lanka through the World Food Program and the Food and Agriculture Organization of United Nations, says the Foreign Minister of New Zealand, Nanaia Mahuta.

In a tweet, she stated that New Zealand is deeply concerned about the hardships being experienced in Sri Lanka and wants to do their part to help feed vulnerable children and assist struggling farmers in Sri Lanka.
